channel.title: Diary of a reverse-engineer - Michele "brt_device" Bertasi

item.title: Keygenning with KLEE
item.description:
Introduction

In the past weeks I enjoyed working on reversing a piece of software (don't ask me the name), to study how serial numbers are validated. The story the user has to follow is pretty common: download the trial, pay, get the serial number, use it in the annoying nag â€¦
item.dc:creator: Michele "brt_device" Bertasi
